Description: A Foreign Service Officer in London tries to prevent a terrorist attack set to hit New York City, but is forced to go on the run when she is framed for crimes she did not commit.

Title: Klip
Description: Jasna is a teenage girl living in the poor suburbs in the south of Belgrade, Serbia. She likes to record everything around her using a mobile phone camera. She is making videos of herself, ...                See full summary »

Title: About Cherry
Description: A troubled young woman moves to San Francisco, where she becomes involved in pornography and aligns herself with a cocaine-addicted lawyer.

Title: Devil's Gate
Description: Seeking a missing woman in North Dakota, an FBI agent and a sheriff focus on her religious zealot husband but discover something far more sinister.

Title: Dziewczyny z wyższych sfer
Description: A grown-up woman, who kept her childish instincts and behavior, starts working as a nanny of a 8-year-old girl, who actually acts like an adult. But in the end everything turns to its right places.

Title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon: Sword of Destiny
Description: A story of lost love, young love, a legendary sword and one last opportunity at redemption.

Title: World Trade Center

Title: Bodied
Description: A progressive graduate student finds success and sparks outrage when his interest in battle rap as a thesis subject becomes a competitive obsession.

Title: Turistas
Description: A group of young backpackers' vacation turns sour when a bus accident leaves them marooned in a remote Brazilian rural area that holds an ominous secret.

Title: Ani slowa wiecej
Description: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.

Title: Party
Description: Janet hosts a party to celebrate her new promotion, but once the guests arrive it becomes clear that not everything is going to go down as smoothly as the red wine.

Title: Prowincjuszka
Description: A Nebraska teen gets more than she bargained for when she sets out for the bright lights of Las Vegas.

Title: Matthias i Maxime
Description: A drama focusing on a group of friends in their late 20s.

Title: Glosne bicie serc
Description: A father and daughter form an unlikely songwriting duo in the summer before she leaves for college.

Title: Ramie za milion dolarów

Title: Diabelska plansza Ouija

Title: Z dystansu
Description: A substitute teacher who drifts from classroom to classroom finds a connection to the students and teachers during his latest assignment.

Title: Duet na zóltych papierach

Title: Ladyworld
Description: Eight teenage girls become trapped in an endless birthday party after a massive (imaginary?) earthquake. The girls' sanity and psyches dissolve as they run out of food and water. Eventually...                See full summary »

Title: Siec podejrzen
Description: A happily married professor, known for having many affairs with students, becomes the prime suspect when a young woman has gone missing.

Title: Zły Mikołaj
Description: A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid.

Description: The night of their high school reunion, a group of friends realize they still haven't quite grown up in some ways.

Title: Fanboys
Description: Star Wars fanatics take a cross-country trip to George Lucas' Skywalker Ranch so their dying friend can see a screening of Gwiezdne wojny: Część I - Mroczne widmo (1999) before its release.

Description: Fonda and Redford star as Addie Moore and Louis Waters, a widow and widower who've lived next to each other for years. The pair have almost no relationship, but that all changes when Addie tries to make a connection with her neighbor.

Title: Poziom -2
Description: A businesswoman is pursued by a psychopath after being locked in a parking garage on Christmas Eve.

Title: Siedzacy slon
Description: Four people in a Chinese city live through a complicated day as their lives intersect.

Title: Alvin i wiewiórki: Wielka wyprawa
Description: Through a series of misunderstandings, Alvin, Simon and Theodore come to believe that Dave is going to propose to his new girlfriend in Miami...and dump them. They have three days to get to him and stop the proposal, saving themselves not only from losing Dave but possibly from gaining a terrible stepbrother.

Title: Po zachodzie slonca
Description: The story of what happens after a master thief achieves his last big score, when the F.B.I. Agent who promised he'd capture him, is about to do just that.

Title: Dina
Description: An eccentric suburban woman and a Walmart door greeter navigate their evolving relationship in this unconventional love story.

Title: Darlin'
Description: A direct sequel to 2011's The Woman.

Title: Swallow

Title: Ciezkie czasy
Description: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

Title: Dziennik cwaniaczka 2
Description: Back in middle school after summer vacation, Greg Heffley and his older brother Rodrick must deal with their parents' misguided attempts to have them bond.

Title: Tysiąc słów
Description: After stretching the truth on a deal with a spiritual guru, literary agent Jack McCall finds a Bodhi tree on his property. Its appearance holds a valuable lesson on the consequences of every word he speaks.

Title: 3000 mil do Graceland
Description: A gang of ex-cons rob a casino during Elvis convention week.

Title: Submission
Description: A cynical college professor takes a keen interest in a talented young writing student.

Title: Naciagacze
Description: A phobic con artist and his protégé are on the verge of pulling off a lucrative swindle when the former's teenage daughter arrives unexpectedly.

Title: 13 kamer

Title: Alvin i wiewiórki 2

Title: Somewhere. Miedzy miejscami
Description: After withdrawing to the Chateau Marmont, a passionless Hollywood actor reexamines his life when his eleven-year-old daughter surprises him with a visit.

Title: Touch Me Not

Title: Zakochana Jane

Title: Kolejny piatek
Description: Two cousins work nights at a local mall as security guards. When their house is robbed on Christmas Eve they team up to track the robber down.

Title: Zly dotyk
Description: A teenage hustler and a young man obsessed with alien abductions cross paths, together discovering a horrible, liberating truth.

Title: Ida
Description: A novice nun about to take her vows uncovers a family secret dating back to the German occupation.

Title: Sorry We Missed You
Description: A hard-up delivery driver and his wife struggle to get by in modern-day England.

Title: Skate Kitchen

Title: Wszystko o Stevenie
Description: Convinced that a CCN cameraman is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together.

Title: You Can Choose Your Family

Title: Podróże Guliwera
Description: Travel writer Lemuel Gulliver takes an assignment in Bermuda, but ends up on the island of Lilliput, where he towers over its tiny citizens.

Title: Transfer
Description: When a terrorist bombing in North Africa kills 19 incl. an American, an Egyptian chemical engineer flying from South Africa to his wife in USA, is arrested upon arriving USA. He disappears. His wife asks senator for help.

Title: Radiowóz
Description: A small-town sheriff sets out to find the two kids who have taken his car on a joy ride.

Title: Ukryta strategia
Description: Injuries sustained by two Army rangers behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.

Title: Lost River

Title: Klient
Description: While both participating in a production of "Death of a Salesman," a teacher's wife is assaulted in her new home, which leaves him determined to find the perpetrator over his wife's traumatized objections.

Title: Zwyczajna dziewczyna
Description: A former secretary, newly appointed as a scriptwriter for propaganda films, joins the cast and crew of a major production while the Blitz rages around them.

Title: Wielki mistrz
Description: The story of martial-arts master Ip Man, the man who trained Bruce Lee.

Title: Kwasne pomarancze
Description: A guidance counselor mistakenly sends out the wrong transcripts to Stanford University under the name of an over-achieving high schooler.

Title: Renegaci
Description: A team of Navy SEALs discover an underwater treasure in a Bosnian lake.

Title: Rachel wychodzi za maz
Description: A young woman who has been in and out of rehab for the past ten years, returns home for the weekend for her sister's wedding.

Title: What They Had
Description: Bridget returns home at her brother's urging to deal with her ailing mother and her father's reluctance to let go of their life together.

Title: Lochy i smoki
Description: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.

Title: Eskorta porucznika
Description: This movie is a love story between an idealistic American nurse and a Turkish officer in World War I.

Title: Our House
Description: A young genius accidentally invents a device that amplifies the paranormal activity within his family's house, possibly bringing back the spirits of loved ones, and unleashing things far worse.

Title: Diana

Title: Opona
Description: A homicidal car tire, discovering it has destructive psionic power, sets its sights on a desert town once a mysterious woman becomes its obsession.

Title: Jackass: Swiry w akcji
Description: Johnny Knoxville and his band of maniacs perform a variety of stunts and gross-out gags on the big screen for the first time.

Title: Notatki o skandalu
Description: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her 15-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond platonic friendship.

Title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown

Title: Nie ma drugiej takiej
Description: A couple who have known each other since 8 are destined to be together until death do them apart.

Title: Wyścig po życie
Description: To save his kidnapped wife, Brent Magna must drive at the orders of a mysterious man.

Title: Legendy sowiego królestwa: Straznicy Ga'Hoole
Description: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.

Title: Femme Fatale
Description: A woman tries to straighten out her life, even as her past as a con-woman comes back to haunt her.

Title: Kingdom
Description: In ancient China, a young boy dreams of becoming the greatest general of the Qin Kingdom.

Title: Zabójczyni
Description: A female assassin receives a dangerous mission to kill a political leader in eighth-century China.

Title: Stolik 19
Description: Eloise, having been relieved of maid of honor duties after being unceremoniously dumped by the best man via text, decides to attend the wedding anyway, only to find herself seated with five fellow unwanted guests at the dreaded Table 19.

Title: Chihuahua z Beverly Hills
Description: While on vacation in Mexico, Chloe, a ritzy Beverly Hills chihuahua, finds herself lost and in need of assistance in order to get back home.

Title: 13 zabójców
Description: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.

Title: O dziewczynie, która wraca noca sama do domu
Description: In the Iranian ghost-town Bad City, a place that reeks of death and loneliness, the townspeople are unaware they are being stalked by a lonesome vampire.

Title: Zyciowe rozterki
Description: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.

Title: Ocalenie
Description: A former CIA operative is kidnapped by a group of terrorists. When his son learns there is no plan for his father to be saved, he launches his own rescue operation.

Title: Raport z Europy

Title: Motel
Description: A married couple becomes stranded at an isolated motel and finds hidden video cameras in their room. They soon realize that unless they escape, they'll be the next victims of a snuff film.

Title: Podwójny kochanek

Title: Goon: Last of the Enforcers

Title: Pozory prawdy

Title: Science Fiction Volume One: The Osiris Child

Description: Astronauts, and their robotic dog AMEE (Autonomous Mapping Evaluation and Evasion), search for solutions to save a dying Earth by searching on Mars, only to have the mission go terribly awry.

Title: Zoom: Akademia superbohaterów
Description: Former superhero Jack is called back to work to transform an unlikely group of ragtag kids into superheroes at a private academy.

Title: Klatwa Jessabelle
Description: Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, Jessabelle comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has been seeking her return -- and has no intention of letting her escape.

Title: Monte Carlo
Description: Three young women vacationing in Paris find themselves whisked away to Monte Carlo after one of the girls is mistaken for a British heiress.

Title: Kapitan Corelli
Description: When a fisherman leaves to fight with the Greek army during World War II, his fiancée falls in love with the local Italian commander.

Title: Semi-Pro: Druzyna marzen?
Description: Jackie Moon, the owner-coach-player of the American Basketball Association's Flint Michigan Tropics, rallies his teammates to make their NBA dreams come true.

Title: Trzynascie dni
Description: In October 1962, the Kennedy administration struggles to contain the Cuban Missile Crisis.

Title: American Mary
Description: The allure of easy money sends Mary Mason, a medical student, into the world of underground surgeries which ends up leaving more marks on her than her so called "freakish" clients.

Title: Recepta na szczescie
Description: Into the life of a widowed professor comes a new love and an unexpected visit from his adopted brother.

Title: Nawet góry przemina
Description: The life of Tao, and those close to her, is explored in three different time periods: 1999, 2014, and 2025.

Title: Torque: Jazda na krawedzi
Description: A biker returns from Thailand to set things straight with his girlfriend. One gang leader wants him for delivery of 2 motorbikes filled with crystal meth and another gang leader wants him for murdering his brother.

Title: Step Up 3D
Description: A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.

Title: Area 51
Description: Three young conspiracy theorists attempt to uncover the mysteries of Area 51, the government's secret location rumored to have hosted encounters with alien beings. What they find at this hidden facility exposes unimaginable secrets.

Title: Stuart Malutki 2
Description: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

Title: American Woman
Description: A woman raises her young grandson after her daughter goes missing.

Title: Pana Magorium cudowne emporium
Description: Molly Mahoney is the awkward and insecure manager of Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium, the strangest, most fantastic, most wonderful toy store in the world. But when Mr. Magorium, the 243-year-old eccentric who owns the store, bequeaths the store to her, a dark and ominous change begins to take over the once-remarkable Emporium.

Title: Robak
Description: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.

Title: Addicted
Description: A gallerist risks her family and flourishing career when she enters into an affair with a talented painter and slowly loses control of her life.

Title: I Saw the Light
Description: The story of the country-western singer Hank Williams, who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his rise to fame and its tragic effect on his health and personal life.

Title: Ramen. Smak wspomnien
Description: A young man who is curious about his deceased parents' past takes a food journey to Singapore where he uncovers more than just delicious meals.

Title: Wyspa Nim
Description: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

Title: Morderca we mnie
Description: A West Texas Deputy Sheriff is slowly unmasked as a psychotic killer.

Title: Wyrok smierci
Description: Nick Hume is a mild-mannered executive with a perfect life, until one gruesome night he witnesses something that changes him forever. Transformed by grief, Hume eventually comes to the disturbing conclusion that no length is too great when protecting his family.

Title: Grave Encounters

Title: Pyewacket
Description: A frustrated, angst-ridden teenage girl awakens something in the woods when she naively performs an occult ritual to evoke a witch to kill her mother.

Title: Swingujace wakacje
Description: A teenager comes of age in a small Australian town during the 1970s when a 200-ton blue whale gets washed up on a local beach.

Title: Niania w Nowym Jorku
Description: A college graduate goes to work as a nanny for a rich New York family. Ensconced in their home, she has to juggle their dysfunction, a new romance, and the spoiled brat in her charge.

Title: Kocham cie, Beth Cooper
Description: A nerdy valedictorian proclaims his love for the hottest and most popular girl in school - Beth Cooper - during his graduation speech. Much to his surprise, Beth shows up at his door that very night and decides to show him the best night of his life.

Title: Georgetown
Description: Ulrich Mott, an ambitious social climber, marries a wealthy widow in Washington D.C. in order to mix with powerful political players.

Title: Chlopaki mojego zycia
Description: A single mother, with dreams of becoming a writer, has a son at the age of 15 in 1965, and goes through a failed marriage with the drug-addicted father.
Several women enter a science fiction author's life over the course of a few years, after the author has lost the woman he considers his one true love.

Title: Apetyt na seks
Description: An uptight, middle-aged, repressed woman turns into a sex addict after getting hit on the head, and she then falls into an underground subculture of sex addicts in suburban Baltimore.

Title: Wojna imperiów

Title: Dzieki tobie, Winn-Dixie
Description: A mischievous dog befriends a lonely young girl in a new town and helps her make new friends.

Title: Dziewiata sesja
Description: Tensions rise within an asbestos cleaning crew as they work in an abandoned mental hospital with a horrific past that seems to be coming back.

Title: Return to Sender

Title: Wampiry i świry
Description: A spoof of vampire-themed movies, where teenager Becca finds herself torn between two boys. As she and her friends wrestle with a number of different dramas, everything comes to a head at their prom.

Title: Cruise

Title: Banita
Description: A mysterious warrior teams up with the daughter and son of a deposed Chinese Emperor to defeat their cruel brother, who seeks their deaths.

Title: Glowa w mur
Description: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.

Title: A wlasnie, ze tak!

Title: 24 Hour Party People

Title: The Perfect Guy

Title: Step Up 4: Revolution
Description: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.

Title: Inside Job

Title: Zabic wspomnienia
Description: A man who lost his family in the September 11 attack on New York City runs into his old college roommate. Rekindling the friendship is the one thing that appears able to help the man recover from his grief.

Title: Przyjazn czy kochanie?
Description: Lady Susan Vernon takes up temporary residence at her in-laws' estate and, while there, is determined to be a matchmaker for her daughter Frederica -- and herself too, naturally.

Title: Uprzejmosc nieznajomych
Description: The story of four people suffering through the worst crises of their lives.

Title: Ashes in the Snow

Title: Zly dotyk

Title: Test na milosc
Description: A woman on the brink of a marriage proposal is told by a friend that she should date other men before spending the rest of her life with her boyfriend.

Title: Donbas

Title: The Escape
Description: An ordinary woman makes an extraordinary decision which will change her life forever.

Along the way, they have misadventures and find fresh connections with an assortment of relatives and old friends who just might help them discover "home" on their own terms for the first time.

Title: Oddech

Title: Całe szczęście
Description: Manhattanite Ashley is known to many as the luckiest woman around. After a chance encounter with a down-and-out young man, however, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.

Title: K-Pax

Title: Ksiezniczka na lodzie
Description: With the help of her coach, her mom, and the boy who drives the Zamboni machine, nothing can stop Casey (Trachtenberg) from realizing her dream to be a champion figure skater.

Title: Eskorta

Description: It has been five years since the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, and a suburban family witness strange events in their neighborhood when a woman and a mysterious child move in.

Title: Thunderbirds
Description: When The Hood finds and invades International Rescue's secret base and traps most of the Tracy family, only young Alan Tracy and his friends can save the day.

Title: Atlas zbuntowany. Część I

Title: Salon pieknosci
Description: A determined hairstylist (Queen Latifah) competes with her former boss (Kevin Bacon) after opening her own business in Atlanta.

Title: Zupełnie jak miłość

Title: Intymnosc

Title: Hesher

Description: Joseph, a man plagued by violence and a rage that is driving him to self-destruction, earns a chance of redemption that appears in the form of Hannah, a Christian charity shop worker.

Description: When a disgraced former college dean has a romance with a mysterious younger woman haunted by her dark, twisted past, he is forced to confront a shocking fact about his own life that he has kept secret for fifty years.

Title: Prorok
Description: A young Arab man is sent to a French prison.

Title: Antwone Fisher

Title: 102 dalmatyńczyki
Description: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

Title: Lato milosci
Description: In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.

Title: Isabelle
Description: A young couple's dream of starting a family shatters as they descend into the depths of paranoia and must struggle to survive an evil presence that wants nothing more than their very own ...                See full summary »

Title: Wróc do mnie
Description: A man who falls in love with the woman who received his wife's heart must decide which woman it is who holds his heart.

Title: Propozycja
Description: A lawman apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother, or else they'll execute his younger brother.

Title: Dog Eat Dog
Description: A crew of ex-cons are hired by a Cleveland mafioso to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster.

Title: Narodziny narodu
Description: Nat Turner, a literate slave and preacher in the antebellum South, orchestrates an uprising.

Title: Piekny dran
Description: Ned and Conor are forced to share a bedroom at their boarding school. The loner and the star athlete at this rugby-mad school form an unlikely friendship until it's tested by the authorities.

Title: Czas zemsty
Description: In New York City, a crime lord's right-hand man is helped by a woman seeking retribution.

Title: Oliver Twist
Description: An adaptation of the classic Dickens tale, where an orphan meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

Description: As the Barrett family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them, one which may have arrived from beyond the stars.

Title: Przyjaciele z kasą
Description: After she quits her lucrative job, Olivia finds herself unsure about her future and her relationships with her successful and wealthy friends.

Title: Kochankowie
Description: A Brooklyn-set romantic drama about a bachelor torn between the family friend his parents wish he would marry and his beautiful but volatile new neighbor.

Description: A young boy's discovery of a colorful, wish-granting rock causes chaos in the suburban town of Black Falls when jealous kids and scheming adults alike set out to get their hands on it.

Description: Things go badly for a hack director and film crew shooting a low budget zombie movie in an abandoned WWII Japanese facility, when they are attacked by real zombies.

Description: When her husband goes missing during their Caribbean vacation, a woman sets off on her own to take down the men she thinks are responsible.

Description: A producer's film is endangered when his star walks off, so he decides to digitally create an actress to substitute for the star, becoming an overnight sensation that everyone thinks is a real person.

Description: In 1975, the dynamics of a Swedish commune begin to change upon the arrival of a beaten wife and her two kids.

Title: Miś Brigsby
Description: After being freed from his life in an underground bunker, a man sets out to make a movie of the only TV show he has ever known.

Title: Nikomu ani słowa
Description: When the daughter of a psychiatrist is kidnapped, he's horrified to discover that the abductors' demand is that he break through to a post traumatic stress disorder suffering young woman who knows a secret...

Title: Pocalunek smoka
Description: A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her.

Description: In thirteenth century England, a Knights Templar and few of the Barons men, fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John.

Description: Elvis Presley and a black "JFK" stay in a nursing home where nothing happens - until a wayward Egyptian mummy comes and sucks out the old people's souls thru their a-holes. The two decide to fight back.

Description: A pair of buddies conspire to save their best friend from marrying the wrong woman.

Description: Survivors of a nuclear attack are grouped together for days in the basement of their apartment building, where fear and dwindling supplies wear away at their dynamic.

Description: A group of smart-talking toddlers find themselves at the center of a media mogul's experiment to crack the code to baby talk. The toddlers must race against time for the sake of babies everywhere.

Title: Pudlaki
Description: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator.

Title: Astro Boy
Description: When an android replica of a boy is rejected by his aggrieved creator, he goes off to find his own identity in an adventure that would make him the greatest hero of his time.

Title: Heavy Trip
Description: Turo (25) is trying to overcome his fears by leading the most unknown heavy metal band in Finland, Impaled Rektum, to the hottest metal festival of Norway. The journey includes heavy metal,...                See full summary »

Title: Obserwator
Description: David is a serial killer of young women. Joel was in charge of catching him in LA. He moved to Chicago a broken man. So did David and sends him photos of his next victims 24 hours before the murders.

Title: Niepamiec
Description: With the aid of a fellow Auschwitz survivor and a hand-written letter, an elderly man with dementia goes in search of the person he believes to be responsible for the death of his family in the death camp to kill him himself.

Title: Kołysz się, dziecino

Title: Inkarnacja
Description: A forensic psychiatrist discovers that all but one of her patient's multiple personalities are murder victims. She will have to find out what's happening before her time is finished.

Title: Paranoja
Description: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.

Title: Charlie St. Cloud
Description: Charlie's brother, Sam, dies in a car crash that Charlie survives. Charlie is given the gift of seeing his dead brother and others who he has lost such as his friend who died in the military, but when the girl he falls in love with's life is at risk, he must choose between his girlfriend and his brother.

Title: Blood Fest
Description: Fans flock to a festival celebrating the most iconic horror movies, only to discover that the charismatic showman behind the event has a diabolical agenda.

Description: A former valedictorian quits her reporter job in New York and returns to the place she last felt happy: her childhood home in Connecticut. She gets work as a lifeguard and starts a dangerous relationship with a troubled teenager.

Title: Wielbicielka
Description: A high school senior with a promising swimming career has a one-night stand with consequences.

Description: Paris, summer 1979. Anne is a producer of cheap gay porn. When Lois, her editor and companion, leaves her, she attempts to get her back by making a more ambitious film with the flamboyant Archibald.

Title: Alex Cross
Description: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled hired killer who specializes in torture and pain.

Title: Wiatr buszujacy w jeczmieniu

Title: Dobry sasiad

Title: Occupation
Description: A small group of town residents have to band together after a devastating ground invasion. As they struggle to survive, they realize they must stay one step ahead of their attackers, and work together for a chance to strike back.

Title: Koriolan
Description: A banished hero of Rome allies with a sworn enemy to take his revenge on the city.

Title: Surwiwalista
Description: In a time of starvation, a survivalist lives off a small plot of land hidden deep in forest. When two women seeking food and shelter discover his farm, he finds his existence threatened.

Title: Dusza i ciało
Description: When slaughterhouse workers Endre and Mária discover they share the same dreams - where they meet in a forest as deer and fall in love - they decide to make their dreams come true but it's difficult in real life.

Title: Manifesto
Description: Cate Blanchett performs manifestos as a series of striking monologues.

Title: The Sapphires: Muzyka duszy
Description: It's 1968, and four young, talented Australian Aboriginal girls learn about love, friendship and war when their all-girl group The Sapphires entertain the US troops in Vietnam.

Title: Rozlaczeni
Description: A drama centered on a group of people searching for human connections in today's wired world.

Title: Kres drogi
Description: Set in a dugout in Aisne in 1918, it is the story of a group of British officers, led by the mentally disintegrating young officer Stanhope, as they await their fate.

Title: W dolinie Elah
Description: A retired military investigator works with a police detective to uncover the truth behind his son's disappearance following his return from a tour of duty in Iraq.

Title: Meczennicy
Description: A woman and her childhood friend seek out revenge on those who victimized and abused them.

Title: Tyler Perry's Boo 2! A Madea Halloween

Title: Czy slyszeliscie o Morganach?

Title: Miss Stevens
Description: A heart-broken teacher chaperones a group of high schoolers to a state drama competition.

Title: Anioł śmierci
Description: 40 years after the first haunting at Eel Marsh House, a group of children evacuated from WWII London arrives, awakening the house's darkest inhabitant.

Title: Syn Szawla

Title: Kaboom

Description: An inner-city junior high school teacher with a drug habit forms an unlikely friendship with one of his students after she discovers his secret.

Title: Sweet Virginia
Description: A former rodeo champ befriends a young man with a propensity for violence.

Title: Kolacja
Description: Two sets of wealthy parents meet for dinner to decide what to do about a crime their sons have committed.

Title: Bad Company - Czeski lacznik
Description: When an Ivy League-educated C.I.A. Agent is killed during an operation, the secret agency recruits his twin brother (Chris Rock).

Title: Mandarynka
Description: A hooker tears through Tinseltown on Christmas Eve searching for the pimp who broke her heart.

Title: Supernova

Title: Majestic
Description: Set in 1951, a blacklisted Hollywood writer gets into a car accident, loses his memory and settles down in a small town where he is mistaken for a long-lost son.

Title: Rejs w nieznane
Description: A snooty socialite is stranded on a Mediterranean island with a communist sailor.

Title: God Bless the Broken Road
Description: While grieving the loss of her husband, a financially struggling widow meets a race car driver.

Title: Szyfry wojny
Description: Two U.S. Marines in World War II are assigned to protect Navajo Marines, who use their native language as an unbreakable radio cypher.

Description: A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.

Title: Piramida
Description: An archaeological team attempts to unlock the secrets of a lost pyramid only to find themselves hunted by an insidious creature.

Title: Daleko od nieba
Description: In 1950s Connecticut, a housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.

Title: Upadek amerykanskiego imperium
Description: A shy and insecure delivery truck driver accidentally arrives on the scene of a major crime and happens to pick up two bags of cash and hide them in his truck. As if an interrogation of two...                See full summary »

Title: Liv i Ingmar
Description: The 42 year long relationship between legendary actress Liv Ullmann and master filmmaker Ingmar Bergman.

Title: Klatwa laleczki Chucky
Description: After her mother's mysterious death, Nica begins to suspect that the talking, red-haired doll her visiting niece has been playing with may be the key to recent bloodshed and chaos.

Title: Gang z boiska
Description: Teenagers at a juvenile detention center, under the leadership of their counselor, gain self-esteem by playing football together.

Title: Chennai Express
Description: A man heading towards Rameshwaram via Chennai express to immerse his late grandfather's ashes unwillingly gets caught amidst goons after helping their boss's daughter and them board the train.

Title: Bracia Oodie
Description: When three redneck brothers agree to help a woman save her godson from an abusive stepfather, they become targets on the run from an odd cast of characters.

Title: Fistaszki - wersja kinowa
Description: Snoopy embarks upon his greatest mission as he and his team take to the skies to pursue their archnemesis, while his best pal Charlie Brown begins his own epic quest back home to win the love of his life.

Title: Bestie z poludniowych krain
Description: Faced with both her hot-tempered father's fading health and melting ice-caps that flood her ramshackle bayou community and unleash ancient aurochs, six-year-old Hushpuppy must learn the ways of courage and love.

Title: Drobne zbrodnie
Description: A disgraced former cop, fresh off a six-year prison sentence for attempted murder - returns home looking for redemption but winds up trapped in the mess he left behind.

Title: Burden
Description: Ku Klux Klansman Mike Burden opens the Redneck Shop and KKK museum in historic Laurens, SC. He subsequently falls in love with a single mom, and, under her influence, quits the Klan and is taken in by an African American Reverend.

Title: Przekleta
Description: A werewolf loose in Los Angeles changes the lives of three young adults who, after being mauled by the beast, learn they must kill it in order to avoid becoming werewolves themselves.

Title: Zwierzak
Description: After receiving organ transplants from various animal donors, a man finds himself taking on the traits of those animals.

Title: Dzienniki motocyklowe
Description: The dramatization of a motorcycle road trip Che Guevara went on in his youth that showed him his life's calling.

Title: Kraina traw
Description: Because of the actions of her irresponsible parents, a young girl is left alone on a decrepit country estate and survives inside her fantastic imagination.

Title: Udlaw sie
Description: A sex-addicted con-man pays for his mother's hospital bills by playing on the sympathies of those who rescue him from choking to death.

Title: Sukiyaki Western Django
Description: A nameless gunfighter arrives in a town ripped apart by rival gangs and, though courted by both to join, chooses his own path.

Title: Kradnac konie
Description: A grieving widower moves to the country where a chance encounter rekindles memories from his past.

Title: Niewidoczni
Description: An illegal Nigerian immigrant discovers the unpalatable side of London life.

Title: Saint Judy
Description: The story of immigration attorney Judy Wood, and how she initiated the change in U.S. law of asylum to save women's lives.

Title: Mroczna dzielnica
Description: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

Title: Do zakochania jeden krok
Description: On the eve of retirement a middle class, judgmental snob discovers her husband has been having an affair with her best friend and is forced into exile with her bohemian sister who lives on an impoverished inner-city council estate.

Title: Dark Water: Fatum
Description: A mother and daughter, still wounded from a bitter custody dispute, hole up in a run-down apartment building. Adding further drama to their plight, they are targeted by the ghost of former resident.
A group of five people find themselves trapped in an elevator. They work together, never giving up hope, to try to escape before the unthinkable happens.

Title: First Girl I Loved
Description: Seventeen-year-old Anne just fell in love with Sasha, the most popular girl at her LA public high school. But when Anne tells her best friend Clifton - who has always harbored a secret crush - he does his best to get in the way.

Title: Sugar Man
Description: Two South Africans set out to discover what happened to their unlikely musical hero, the mysterious 1970s rock n roller, Rodriguez.

Title: Frontière(s)
Description: A gang of young thieves flee Paris during the violent aftermath of a political election, only to hole up at an Inn run by neo-Nazis.

Title: Uwiklani
Description: A dramatization of the shocking Barbara Daly Baekeland murder case, which happened in a posh London flat on Friday 17 November 1972. The bloody crime caused a stir on both sides of the Atlantic and remains one of the most memorable American Tragedies...

Title: Matka
Description: A woman has a passionate affair with a man half her age, who is also sleeping with her daughter.

Title: Tamara i mezczyzni
Description: A young newspaper writer returns to her hometown in the English countryside, where her childhood home is being prepped for sale.

Title: Taeksi woonjunsa
Description: A widowed father and taxi driver who drives a German reporter from Seoul to Gwangju to cover the 1980 uprising, soon finds himself regretting his decision after being caught in the violence around him.

Title: Męska rzecz
Description: A soon-to-be husband wakes up on the morning after his bachelor party in bed with another woman.

Title: The Comedian
Description: A look at the life of an aging insult comic named Jack Burke.

Title: Kobieta w klatce
Description: Police inspector Carl Mørck is put in charge of a department of cold cases, joined only by his assistant, Assad. They dig into a case about a disappeared woman.

Title: Kruk: Zagadka zbrodni
Description: When a madman begins committing horrific murders inspired by Edgar Allan Poe's works, a young Baltimore detective joins forces with Poe to stop him from making his stories a reality.

Title: Mustang
Description: When five orphan girls are seen innocently playing with boys on a beach, their scandalized conservative guardians confine them while forced marriages are arranged.

Title: Moje córki
Description: A mechanic falls in love with his attorney.

Title: Zabójcza ziemia
Description: A couple's camping trip turns into a frightening ordeal when they stumble across the scene of a horrific crime.

Title: Czarna smierc

Title: Wysoka fala
Description: When young Jay Moriarity discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it.

Title: Solista
Description: A newspaper journalist discovers a homeless musical genius and tries to improve his situation.

Title: Gomorra
Description: Scampia Vele is the corbusian architecture which has become a stronghold for Mafia of Naples, Italy.

Title: Rebel in the Rye

Title: Informers
Description: One week in L.A. in 1983, featuring movie executives, rock stars, a vampire and other morally challenged characters in adventures laced with sex, drugs and violence.

Title: Najlepszy ojciec swiata
Description: When his son's body is found in a humiliating accident, a lonely high school teacher inadvertently attracts an overwhelming amount of community and media attention after covering up the truth with a phony suicide note.

Title: Garbi - superbryka

Title: Sztuka dorastania

Title: Kraina Jane Austen
Description: Obsessed with Duma i uprzedzenie (1995), a woman travels to a Jane Austen theme park in search for her perfect gentleman.

Title: Ucieczka od zycia
Description: A young man's peculiar upbringing renders him unable to competently cope with the struggle of growing up.

Title: Underdog
Description: A Beagle must use his newly-bestowed superpowers to defend Capitol City from mad scientist Simon Barsinister.

Title: Ostre dziewczyny
Description: Three bad girls travel to a remote desert hideaway to steal $200 million in diamonds from a ruthless underworld kingpin.

Title: Deathgasm
Description: Two teenage boys unwittingly summon an ancient evil entity known as The Blind One by delving into black magic while trying to escape their mundane lives.

Title: Scenariusz na milosc
Description: An Oscar-winning writer in a slump leaves Hollywood to teach screenwriting at a college on the East Coast, where he falls for a single mom taking classes there.

Title: Scena zbrodni
Description: A documentary which challenges former Indonesian death-squad leaders to reenact their mass-killings in whichever cinematic genres they wish, including classic Hollywood crime scenarios and lavish musical numbers.

Title: Drugi Hotel Marigold
Description: As the Best Exotic Marigold Hotel has only a single remaining vacancy - posing a rooming predicament for two fresh arrivals - Sonny pursues his expansionist dream of opening a second hotel.

Title: Grzeczny i grzeszny

Title: Kontrola gniewu
Description: An acclaimed college basketball coach is demoted to a junior varsity team after a public meltdown.

Title: Bratz
Description: During their first year of high school, four best girlfriends face off against the domineering student body President, who wants to split them up into different social cliques.

Title: Sekta
Description: A senior at an ivy league college, who depends on scholarships and working on the side, gets accepted into the secret society The Skulls. He hopes it betters chances at Harvard but The Skulls is not what he thought and comes at a price.

Title: Celeste i Jesse: Na zawsze razem
Description: A divorcing couple tries to maintain their friendship while they both pursue other people.

Title: Sposób na morderstwo

But his fascination with an unsolved murder leads him into a spiral of chaos as he is forced to play cat-and-mouse with a clever killer and an overambitious detective, while at the same time lusting after another woman.

Title: Pan Popper i jego pingwiny
Description: The life of a businessman begins to change after he inherits six penguins, and as he transforms his apartment into a winter wonderland, his professional side starts to unravel.

Title: Champion
Description: When heavyweight champion George "Iceman" Chambers lands in prison, the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champ.

Title: Dahmer

Title: Starred Up

Description: A worldwide epidemic encourages a biotech company to launch an organ-financing program similar in nature to a standard car loan. The repossession clause is a killer, however.

Title: Resolution
Description: A man imprisons his estranged junkie friend in an isolated cabin in the boonies of San Diego to force him through a week of sobriety, but the events of that week are being mysteriously manipulated.

Title: Hollywoodland
Description: A detective examines the mysterious death of George Reeves, the star of the television series Adventures of Superman (1952).

Title: Znamie
Description: A grieving doctor is being contacted by his late wife through his patients' near death experiences.

Title: Piknik z niedzwiedziami

Title: Malowany welon

Title: Czlowiek na linie

Title: Burying the Ex
Description: A guy's regrets over moving in with his girlfriend are compounded when she dies and comes back as a zombie.

Title: Wonderstruck
Description: Tells the tale of two children separated by fifty years. In 1927, Rose searches for the actress whose life she chronicles in her scrapbook; in 1977, Ben runs away from home to find his father.

Title: The Year of Spectacular Men

Title: Księga cieni: Blair Witch 2

Title: Bel Canto
Description: A world-renowned opera singer becomes trapped in a hostage situation when she's invited to perform for a wealthy industrialist in South America.

Title: Mgla
Description: A thick mist full of vengeful spirits haunts a prosperous island town off the coast of Oregon, as its inhabitants try to learn their town's dark secret in order to stop it.

Title: Zmartwychwstały
Description: In 33 AD, a Roman Tribune in Judea is tasked to find the missing body of Jesus Christ, who rose from the dead.

Title: Pani Zlo
Description: A female assassin leaves a trail of bodies behind her as she seeks revenge.

Title: Birth of the Dragon

It takes its inspiration from the epic and still controversial showdown between an up-and-coming Bruce Lee and kung fu master Wong Jack Man - a battle that gave birth to a legend.

Title: Untogether

Title: Słynna Bettie Page
Description: The life of Bettie Page, a 1950s pin-up model and one of the first sex icons in America, who became the target of a Senate investigation due to her risqué bondage photos.

Title: Dobry, zly i zakrecony
Description: The story of two outlaws and a bounty hunter in 1940s Manchuria and their rivalry to possess a treasure map while being pursued by the Japanese army and Chinese bandits.

Title: Luz

Title: Scoop - Gorący temat
Description: An American journalism student in London scoops a big story, and begins an affair with an aristocrat as the incident unfurls.

Title: Zycie jak dom
Description: When a man is diagnosed with terminal cancer, he takes custody of his misanthropic teenage son, for whom quality time means getting high, engaging in small-time prostitution, and avoiding his father.

Title: Krowy na wypasie
Description: When the farmer's away, all the animals play, and sing, and dance. Eventually, though, someone has to step in and run things, a responsibility that ends up going to Otis, a carefree cow.

Description: JR busts out of prison with Brendan Lynch, Australia's most notorious criminal, and joins Lynch's gang for a gold heist that soon pits the two men against one another.

Title: Harold i Kumar: Spalone swieta
Description: Six years after their Guantanamo Bay adventure, stoner buds Harold Lee and Kumar Patel cause a holiday fracas by inadvertently burning down Harold's father-in-law's prize Christmas tree.

Title: Wieczór kawalerski w plenerze
Description: A bachelor party weekend in the great outdoors takes some unexpected detours.

Title: Chinski lacznik
Description: A Chinese IT company representative attempts to spoil a conspiracy to start a civil war in an African country orchestrated by an European businessman who is aided by a tough African warrior.

Title: May
Description: A lonely young woman traumatized by a difficult childhood and unsuccessful attempts to connect with the people around her is sent into a murderous tailspin.

Title: Nancy Drew
Description: Teen detective Nancy Drew accompanies her father on a business trip to Los Angeles, where she happens upon clues to a murder mystery involving a movie star.

Title: Ja, ty i on
Description: A best man (Wilson) stays on as a houseguest with the newlyweds, much to the couple's annoyance.

Title: The Slammin' Salmon
Description: The owner of a Miami restaurant indebted to the mob institutes a contest to see what waiter can earn the most money in one night.

Title: Ocaleni
Description: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

Title: Jonathan
Description: Jonathan leaves the office everyday at noon. When he gets home, he goes to sleep. Every morning he wakes up and there is a breakfast prepared for him along with a video telling him about the second part of his day.

Title: A Rumor of Angels
Description: An old woman helps a young boy resolve his feelings over the death of his mother.

Title: W 80 dni dookoła świata
Description: To win a bet, an eccentric British inventor beside his Chinese valet and an aspiring French artist, embarks on a trip full of adventures and dangers around the world in exactly eighty days.

Title: Cien wampira
Description: The filming of Nosferatu - symfonia grozy (1922) is hampered by the fact that its star Max Schreck is taking the role of a vampire far more seriously than seems humanly possible.

Title: Message from the King
Description: A mysterious outsider from South Africa, named Jacob King, arrives in Los Angeles to look for his missing younger sister.

Title: Too Late
Description: Explores the tangled relationship between a troubled private investigator and the missing woman he's hired to help find.

Title: Grind
Description: Four skaters follow their idol on his summer tour in an attempt to get noticed, get sponsored, and become stars themselves.

Title: Alone in the Dark: Wyspa cienia
Description: A detective of the paranormal slowly unravels mysterious events with deadly results.

Title: Control
Description: A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to commit suicide at the age of 23.

Title: Accidental Love
Description: A small town waitress gets a nail accidentally lodged in her head causing unpredictable behavior that leads her to Washington, D.C., where sparks fly when she meets a clueless young senator who takes up her cause - but what happens when love interferes with what you stand for?

Title: Koń wodny: Legenda głębin
Description: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

Title: Sekrety
Description: Two young women find themselves struggling to survive in Paris, street-wise Nathalie, a stripper, and naïve Sandrine, a barmaid. Together, they discover that sex can be used to their ...                See full summary »

Title: Armstrong
Description: Dramatic, moving and deeply human, ARMSTRONG offers the definitive life story of Neil Armstrong: from his childhood in Ohio to his first steps on the Moon, and beyond.

Title: Odwróceni zakochani
Description: Adam and Eden fell in love as teens despite the fact that they live on twinned worlds with gravities that pull in opposite directions. Ten years after a forced separation, Adam sets out on a dangerous quest to reconnect with his love.

Title: Barbershop
Description: A day in the life of a South Side Chicago barbershop.

Title: Happy End
Description: Gradually succumbing to dementia, George Laurent, the octogenarian patriarch of the Laurents, an affluent upper-bourgeois family, is uncomfortably sharing his palatial manor in Calais, the ...                See full summary »

Title: Boundaries
Description: Laura and her son Henry are forced to drive her estranged, pot-dealing, carefree father Jack across country after being kicked out of a nursing home.

Title: Keep the Change
Description: A New York City romantic comedy, Keep the Change is the unlikely love story of two people who meet in a support group.

Title: Milosna ukladanka
Description: Set in 1985, working-class student Brian Jackson (McAvoy) navigates his first year at Bristol University.

Title: Fighting
Description: In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.

Title: Anna
Description: A man with the ability to enter people's memories takes on the case of a brilliant, troubled sixteen-year-old girl to determine whether she is a sociopath or a victim of trauma.

Title: Piraci!
Description: Pirate Captain sets out on a mission to defeat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz for the Pirate of the year Award. The quest takes Captain and his crew from the shores of Blood Island to the foggy streets of Victorian London.

Title: Phil
Description: A depressed dentist in mid life crisis tries to learn why one of his happiest patients suddenly commits suicide, and a dark comedic adventure ensues.

Title: Biker Boyz
Description: A son of the leader of a legendary group of an urban biker gang tries to retain his championship title.

Title: Gol!
Description: The extremely talented Santiago Munez is given a chance at professional football, after being spotted by a scout who has ties with Newcastle United.

Title: Samsara
Description: Filmed over nearly five years in twenty-five countries on five continents, and shot on seventy-millimetre film, Samsara transports us to the varied worlds of sacred grounds, disaster zones, industrial complexes, and natural wonders.

Title: Max
Description: A military dog that helped American Marines in Afghanistan returns to the United States and is adopted by his handler's family after suffering a traumatic experience.

Title: Strategia mistrza
Description: An Irish sports journalist becomes convinced that Lance Armstrong's performances during the Tour de France victories are fueled by banned substances. With this conviction, he starts hunting for evidence that will expose Armstrong.

Title: Niebo istnieje... naprawdę
Description: A small-town father must find the courage and conviction to share his son's extraordinary, life-changing experience with the world.

Title: Home Sweet Hell
Description: Don Champagne seems to have it all, but when his wife, Mona, learns of his affair with a pretty new salesgirl, she will stop at nothing to maintain their storybook life.

Title: Orzel kontra rekin
Description: Eagle vs Shark is the tale of two socially awkward misfits and the strange ways they try to find love; through revenge on high-school bullies, burgers, and video games.

Title: Czerwony zólw
Description: A man is shipwrecked on a deserted island and encounters a red turtle, which changes his life.

Title: Duchy kanionu
Description: A family unknowingly awakens an ancient supernatural entity on a Grand Canyon vacation, and must fight for survival when it follows them home.

Title: To wlasnie seks
Description: The secret lives of five suburban couples living in Sydney reveal both the fetishes and the repercussions that come with sharing them.

Title: Śnieżny ptak
Description: In 1988, a teenage girl's life is thrown into chaos when her mother disappears.

Title: Hollarsowie
Description: A man returns to his small hometown after learning that his mother has fallen ill and is about to undergo surgery.

Title: Czarna owca
Description: An experiment in genetic engineering turns harmless sheep into bloodthirsty killers that terrorize a sprawling New Zealand farm.

Title: Gong fu yu jia
Description: Two professors team up to locate a lost treasure and embark on an adventure that takes them from a Tibetan ice cave to Dubai, and to a mountain temple in India.

Title: Lux Æterna
Description: Two actresses, Béatrice Dalle and Charlotte Gainsbourg, are on a film set telling stories about witches - but that's not all. 'Lux Æterna' is also an essay on cinema, the love of film, and on-set hysterics.

Title: Egzorcysta: Początek
Description: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

Title: Żywiciel
Description: In 2001, Afghanistan is under the control of the Taliban. When her father is captured, a determined young girl disguises herself as a boy in order to provide for her family.

Title: Tamten swiat samobójców
Description: A film set in a strange afterlife way station that has been reserved for people who have committed suicide.

Title: Ithaca
Description: With his older brother off to war, fourteen-year-old telegram messenger Homer Macauley comes of age in the summer of 1942.

Title: The Single Moms Club
Description: When five struggling single moms put aside their differences to form a support group, they find inspiration and laughter in their new sisterhood, and help each other overcome the obstacles that stand in their way.

Title: Come to Daddy
Description: A man in his thirties travels to a remote cabin to reconnect with his estranged father.

Title: Pozegnanie z niewinnoscia
Description: A teenage girl is targeted by an online sexual predator.

Title: Ride
Description: A cautionary tale aimed at a technology-obsessed society.

Title: Pozegnania
Description: A newly unemployed cellist takes a job preparing the dead for funerals.

Title: Wiem, kto mnie zabil
Description: A young woman who was missing reappears, but she claims to be someone else entirely.

Title: Moja supereksdziewczyna
Description: When a regular guy dumps a superhero for her neediness, she uses her powers to make his life a living hell.

Title: Dziwna magia
Description: Goblins, elves, fairies and imps, and their misadventures sparked by the battle over a powerful potion.

Title: An Evening with Beverly Luff Linn
Description: Lulu Danger's unsatisfying marriage takes a turn for the worse when a mysterious man from her past comes to town to perform an event called "An Evening With Beverly Luff Linn; For One Magical Night Only."

Title: Kot Bob i ja
Description: Based on the international best selling book. The true feel good story of how James Bowen, a busker and recovering drug addict, had his life transformed when he met a stray ginger cat.

Title: Race
Description: Jesse Owens' quest to become the greatest track and field athlete in history thrusts him onto the world stage of the 1936 Olympics, where he faces off against Adolf Hitler's vision of Aryan supremacy.

Title: Margaret
Description: A young woman witnesses a bus accident, and is caught up in the aftermath, where the question of whether or not it was intentional affects many people's lives.

Title: Naprzód, Indie!
Description: Kabir Khan is the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team and his dream is to make his all girls team emerge victorious against all odds.

Title: Proud Mary
Description: Mary (Taraji P. Henson) is a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

Title: Kawa i papierosy
Description: A series of vignettes that all have coffee and cigarettes in common.

Title: Pakt z morderca
Description: An assassin helps a young woman avenge the death of her family.

Title: W kregu milosci
Description: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

Title: Kupiec wenecki
Description: In 16th century Venice, when a merchant must default on a large loan from an abused Jewish moneylender for a friend with romantic ambitions, the bitterly vengeful creditor demands a gruesome payment instead.

Title: Eloise
Description: Four friends break into an abandoned insane asylum in search of a death certificate which will grant one of them a large inheritance. However, finding it soon becomes the least of their worries in a place haunted by dark memories.

Title: Kontrola absolutna
Description: A millionaire has his life turned upside down after firing his I.T. consultant.

Title: Kung Pow: Enter the Fist
Description: A rough-around-the-edges martial arts master seeks revenge for his parent's death.

Title: Niezwyciezony Secretariat
Description: Penny Chenery Tweedy and colleagues guide her long-shot but precocious stallion to set, in 1973, the unbeaten record for winning the Triple Crown.

Title: Wysoka dziewczyna
Description: 1945, Leningrad. WWII has devastated the city, demolishing its buildings and leaving its citizens in tatters, physically and mentally. Two young women search for meaning and hope in the struggle to rebuild their lives amongst the ruins.

Title: A Haunted House 2
Description: Having exorcised the demons of his ex, Malcolm is starting fresh with his new girlfriend and her two children. After moving into their dream home, however, Malcolm is once again plagued by bizarre paranormal events.

Title: Anglik, który mnie kochal
Description: A drama about a Cambridge poetry professor who begins to re-evaluate his life of Byronic excess.

Title: Mama i ja
Description: As inventor Andy Brewster is about to embark on the road trip of a lifetime, a quick stop at his mom's house turns into an unexpected cross-country voyage with her along for the ride.

Title: Sorry Angel
Description: Jacques is an older writer from Paris. Arthur is a young student in Rennes. They instantly fall in love. But they'll have to face rejection and sickness to keep it that way.

Title: Tajemnice Manhattanu
Description: A reporter becomes involved with a mysterious woman while investigating her late husband's death.

Title: Miasto slepców
Description: A city is ravaged by an epidemic of instant white blindness.

Title: Barefoot
Description: The "black sheep" son of a wealthy family meets a young psychiatric patient who's been raised in isolation her entire life. He then takes the naive young woman home for his brother's wedding.

Title: Mina
Description: After a failed assassination attempt, a soldier finds himself stranded in the desert. Exposed to the elements, he must survive the dangers of the desert and battle the psychological and physical tolls of the treacherous conditions.

Title: Tam gdzie ty
Description: A young man wins and loses the first serious love of his life. Al Connelly falls in love with the girl of his dreams. After the summer she breaks up with him. As he tries to recover Al goes to desperate measures.

Title: Transamerica

Description: In efforts to construct perfect android killing machines in a war against China, UK scientists exceed their goal and create a sentient robot.

Complicating matters are one of her father's ex-students, who wants to search through his papers, and her estranged sister, who shows up to help settle his affairs.

Title: Bez skrupulów
Description: While researching his novel "In Cold Blood", Truman Capote develops a close relationship with convicted murderers Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.

Title: Clemency
Description: Years of carrying out death row executions have taken a toll on prison warden Bernadine Williams. As she prepares to execute another inmate, Bernadine must confront the psychological and ...                See full summary »

Title: Boulevard

The events leading up to an 11:14 p.m. car crash, from five very different perspectives.

Three college friends hit the biggest party of the year, where a mysterious phenomenon disrupts the night, quickly descending into a chaos that challenges their friendships - and whether they can stay alive.

Title: Duke of Burgundy. Reguły pożądania

When one of the teens is captured, those who remain - a group that includes the cop who put a bullet in Goodnight's head four years ago - band together to survive against the brutal killer.

Description: A thief works with his father and son to forge a painting by Monet and steal the original. Together, they plan the heist of their lives.

Title: High Strung
Description: When a hip hop violinist busking in the New York subway encounters a classical dancer on scholarship at the Manhattan Conservatory of the Arts, sparks fly. With the help of a hip hop dance ...                See full summary »

Title: Brick Mansions: Najlepszy z najlepszych

Description: A jaded psychotherapist returns to her first passion of becoming a writer.

Title: Zrobione!
Description: Two aspiring boxers, lifelong friends, get involved in a money-laundering scheme through a low-level organized crime group.

Title: Obcy na poddaszu
Description: A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens.

Title: Mamuśki mają wychodne
Description: Four moms whose only common ground is their kids' preschool class, decide to get together for a harmless "fun mom dinner."

Title: Życie i cała reszta
Description: Jerry Falk learns a lesson the hard way when he falls head over heels in love with a beautiful but flighty girl, Amanda.

Title: Sum
Description: Young filmmakers document their colleague's budding online friendship with a young woman and her family which leads to an unexpected series of discoveries.

Title: Zaginiony bez sladu
Description: A man's nervous breakdown causes him to leave his wife and live in his attic for several months.

Title: Schylek dnia
Description: A young girl grows up to become a strong and fearless woman in Budapest before World War I.

Title: Niesamowici bracia Bloom
Description: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

Title: Meska historia
Description: An unruly class of gifted and charming teenage boys are taught by two eccentric and innovative teachers, as their headmaster pushes for them all to get accepted into Oxford or Cambridge.

Title: Dwa dni, jedna noc
Description: Liège, Belgium. Sandra is a factory worker who discovers that her workmates have opted for a EUR1,000 bonus in exchange for her dismissal. She has only a weekend to convince her colleagues to give up their bonuses in order to keep her job.

Title: Krystal
Description: A young man living a sheltered life develops a crush on an ex-stripper and joins her Alcoholics Anonymous group just so he can be in the same room with her.

Title: Mis Yogi
Description: A documentary filmmaker travels to Jellystone Park to shoot a project and soon crosses paths with Yogi Bear, his sidekick Boo-Boo and Ranger Smith.

Title: Pokój, milosc i nieporozumienia
Description: An uptight New York City lawyer takes her two teenagers to her hippie mother's farmhouse upstate for a family vacation.

Title: Szalona noc
Description: Alex, Emily, and their son, RJ, are new to Los Angeles. A chance meeting at the park introduces them to the mysterious Kurt, Charlotte, and Max. A family "playdate" becomes increasingly interesting as the night goes on.

Title: Milosc w czasach zarazy
Description: Florentino, rejected by the beautiful Fermina at a young age, devotes much of his adult life to carnal affairs as a desperate attempt to heal his broken heart.

Title: Party Monster
Description: Based on the true story of Michael Alig, a Club Kid party organizer whose life was sent spiraling down when he bragged on television about killing his drug dealer and roommate.

Title: The Goods: Live Hard, Sell Hard
Description: Used-car liquidator Don Ready is hired by a flailing auto dealership to turn their Fourth of July sale into a majorly profitable event.

Title: Kryzys to nasz pomysl
Description: A battle-hardened American political consultant is sent to help re-elect a controversial president in Bolivia, where she must compete with a long-term rival working for another candidate.

Title: Riwiera dla dwojga
Description: A divorced couple scheme to recover the retirement money that was stolen from them.

Title: The Tomorrow Man
Description: Ed Hemsler spends his life preparing for a disaster that may never come. Ronnie Meisner spends her life shopping for things she may never use. These two people will try to find love.

Title: W cudzej skórze
Description: A documentary centered on a young man in Spain who claims to a grieving Texas family that he is their 16-year-old son who has been missing for 3 years.

Title: Tokarev. Zabójca z przeszłości
Description: When the daughter of a reformed criminal is kidnapped, he rounds up his old crew and seeks his own brand of justice.

Title: Gra cieni
Description: Korean resistance fighters smuggle explosives to destroy facilities controlled by Japanese forces in this period action thriller.

Title: Uspieni
Description: A university professor and a team of students conduct an experiment on a young woman, uncovering terrifyingly dark, unexpected forces in the process.

Title: Absolwentka
Description: Ryden Malby graduates from college and is forced to move back into her childhood home with her eccentric family, while she attempts to find a job, the right guy, and just a hint of where her life is headed.

Title: Boze, blogoslaw Ameryke
Description: On a mission to rid society of its most repellent citizens, terminally ill Frank makes an unlikely accomplice in 16-year-old Roxy.

Title: Knock Down the House
Description: A look at the people involved with various political campaigns during the 2018 U.S. congressional election.

Title: Zabawy z bronia
Description: Filmmaker Michael Moore explores the roots of America's predilection for gun violence.

Title: Glos wolnosci
Description: The idealist William Wilberforce maneuvers his way through Parliament, endeavoring to end the British transatlantic slave trade.

Title: In Like Flynn

Title: Temple
Description: Three American tourists follow a mysterious map deep into the jungles of Japan searching for an ancient temple. When spirits entrap them, their adventure quickly becomes a horrific nightmare.

Title: Escobar: Historia nieznana
Description: In Colombia, a young surfer meets the woman of his dreams - and then meets her uncle, Pablo Escobar.

Title: Making Babies

Title: Camp X-Ray

Title: Slady zbrodni
Description: A former cop who now earns a wage as a crime scene cleaner unknowingly participates in a cover-up at his latest job.

Title: Deadfall: W potrzasku

Title: Beyond the Lights

Title: Glebokie blekitne morze

Title: Odważni
Description: When a tragedy strikes close to home, four police officers struggle with their faith and their roles as husbands and fathers; together they make a decision that will change all of their lives.

Title: Czysty strzal
Description: The tragic death of a beautiful young girl starts a tense and atmospheric game of cat and mouse between hunter John Moon and the hardened backwater criminals out for his blood.

Title: The Bay
Description: Chaos breaks out in a small Maryland town after an ecological disaster occurs.

Title: Paranormal Activity 3

Title: Kobiety w opalach
Description: A serpentine day in the life of ten seemingly disparate women: a porn star, a flight attendant, a psychiatrist, a masseuse, a bartender, a pair of call girls, etc. All of them with one crucial thing in common. Trouble.

Title: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
Description: A slovenly cable repairman becomes a big city Health Inspector, and is tasked with uncovering the source of a food poisoning epidemic.

Title: Bayou Caviar

Title: Mlodosc Astrid
Description: Biopic of Swedish writer Astrid Lindgren, the author of numerous children's books and creator of Pippi Longstocking.

Title: Syrena
Description: Shan, a mermaid, is sent to assassinate Xuan, a developer who threatens the ecosystem of her race, but ends up falling in love with him instead.

Title: Niedościgli Jonesowie

Title: Papi Chulo

Title: First Light
Description: Alex is floating unconscious in a lake when light from a UFO of light saves her by enhancing her abilities such as telekinesis and healing power. Her friend Sean helps her. The authorities want her - not just for stealing a police car.

Title: Prognoza na zycie
Description: A Chicago weather man, separated from his wife and children, debates whether professional and personal success are mutually exclusive.

Title: Cedar Rapids
Description: Tim Lippe has no idea what he's in for when he's sent to Cedar Rapids, Iowa to represent his company at an annual insurance convention, where he soon finds himself under the "guidance" of three convention veterans.

Title: Country Strong
Description: A rising country-music songwriter works with a fallen star to work their way to fame, causing romantic complications along the way.

Title: Zaczyna sie od pocalunku

Description: Turning her back on her wealthy, established family, Diane Arbus falls in love with Lionel Sweeney, an enigmatic mentor who introduces Arbus to the marginalized people who help her become one of the most revered photographers of the twentieth century.

Title: Skok Henry'ego

Title: I Melt with You
Description: When four 40-something college friends meet up for their annual reunion, things start to spiral out of control, and a pact they made as young men is revisited.

Title: Wielkie klopoty
Description: The lives of several Miami denizens, from ad agents to gunrunners to street thugs to law enforcement to school-children, intersect with humorous and dangerous results.

Title: Kill Switch
Description: A pilot battles to save his family and the planet after an experiment for unlimited energy goes wrong.

Title: Piotrus Pan: Wielki powrót
Description: In London during World War II, this is the story of Wendy's daughter, Jane, who is kidnapped by Captain Hook and Peter Pan must come to the rescue.

Title: Skok przez miotłę
Description: Two very different families converge on Martha's Vineyard one weekend for a wedding.

Title: Zupelnie Nowy Testament
Description: Did you know that God is alive and lives in Brussels with his daughter?

Title: Tytul do praw
Description: New Jersey police lieutenant, Laurel Hester, and her registered domestic partner, Stacie Andree, both battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer.

Title: Milosc w Nowym Jorku
Description: Romantic drama about an aging playboy who falls for a sweet, but terminally ill, young woman.

Title: Wzburzenie - Opowiesc o dojrzewaniu

Title: Czarny rycerz
Description: Martin Lawrence plays Jamal, an employee in Medieval World amusement park. After sustaining a blow to the head, he awakens to find himself in 14th century England.

Title: Staten Island Summer
Description: Pals Danny and Frank spend the summer after high school working as lifeguards while figuring out their future.

Title: American Heist. Skok zycia.
Description: James owes his life to his older brother, Frankie after taking the rap for a crime they committed together. While Frankie served time, James worked to turn his life around, got a steady job and began courting his former girlfriend Emily. Now, Frankie is released and back on the streets with no money and no place to go.

Title: Topór 2
Description: Marybeth escapes the clutches of the bayou-butcher Victor Crowley and returns to the swamp with an army of hunters and gunmen, determined to end Crowley's reign of horror once and for all.

Title: Kocurek
